title: The HALO Trust - Humanitarian mine action Ukraine
description: Humanitarian mine action. Manual clearance, non-technical surveys. Goal: Risks from mines, cluster munitions and other explosive weapons are reduced to a level where civilians can live safely and development is not constrained. Outcome 1: Security and stability is enhances, risk of death and injury to individuals and communities reduced. Outcome 2: Enhanced resilience for rural communities and vulnerable groups by improving access to resources, livelihoods and socio-economic opportunities. HALO operates with an integrated gender-sensitive approach to ensure that womenâ€™s voices are incorporated throughout the land release process.
